statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name = 'Alice'
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT patient_name, health_history FROM patient_records WHERE health_history LIKE '%flu%'
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01'
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE DATE(date_of_birth) >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, health_history FROM patient_records WHERE health_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth, treatment_plan FROM patient_records WHERE DATE(date_of_birth) BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, birth_date, gender FROM patients WHERE height > 170;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(weight) AS max_weight FROM patients GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_patients FROM treatment_plans;
SELECT name, birth_date, weight FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM treatment_plans WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT name, height, weight FROM patients WHERE birth_date <= '2000-01-01' AND height > 170 ORDER BY height ASC;
SELECT plan_id, treatment_details, start_date, end_date FROM treatment_plans WHERE ARRAY_LENGTH(medicaments) > 2;
SELECT patient_id, name, birth_date, gender, height, weight FROM patients ORDER BY birth_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19' AND treatment_plan='Isolation';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC, last_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY last_name ASC;

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.diagnosis, m.date_created FROM Patients p INNER JOIN MedicalHistory m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY m.date_created DESC;

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, a.appointment_date, a.doctor_name FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE a.appointment_date > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY a.appointment_date ASC;

SELECT p.first_name, p.last_name, m.diagnosis, a.appointment_date FROM Patients p INNER JOIN MedicalHistory m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id INNER JOIN Appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE m.diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%' AND a.appointment_date < NOW() ORDER BY a.appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, personal_history FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital FROM doctors;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital FROM doctors WHERE hospital = 'General Hospital';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_description FROM patients INNER JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_name, reason_for_visit FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT p.patient_name, r.diagnosis, a.doctor_name FROM patients p JOIN health_records r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE r.diagnosis = 'Hypertension';
SELECT p.patient_name, m.medication_name, m.dosage, a.appointment_date FROM patients p JOIN medications m ON p.patient_id = m.medication_id JOIN appointments a ON p.patient_id = a.patient_id;
SELECT p.patient_name, l.test_name, l.result_value FROM patients p JOIN lab_results l ON p.patient_id = l.patient_id WHERE l.result_date >= '2022-01-01';
